name: MothClicker
description:
Attract the moths with your flashlight!

Catch the moths with your net to collect points, which can be used in the shop for upgrades!

Controls:

PC:

  • Use the MOUSE to crank the flashlight, collect moths, and upgrade stats

Android:

  • Use the TOUCHSCREEN to crank the flashlight, collect moths, and upgrade stats

Created by Epowerj and Pitanova during the 2022 ZenoJam

Font used: Gameplay from dafonts.com by Geronimo
